Package gw.api.rest.exceptions

Class RequestErrorInfo

java.lang.Object
gw.api.exception.MessageFragment
gw.api.exception.ErrorDetail
gw.api.exception.ErrorInfo
gw.api.rest.exceptions.RequestErrorInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class RequestErrorInfo extends ErrorInfo
This class represents a standardized error format for returning error details to an end user as the response body of a 4xx or 5xx error.
See Also:
